title: Please Increase Volume of Forsaken Jayce's sfx
body: The new jayce skin has lower sound effects than "normal". At first I thought it was because I'm not used to the new sfx, but i turned of the in-game music and still couldn't clearly hear the sfx. Please look into it, thanks for your time RIot.

replies.body: Careful, you might end up with him being like Eternum Nocturne, who's about three times louder than any other champion.

I didn't originally work on Eternum Nocturne, but after playing him I'd definitely agree that he is loud compared to base.  I'll go ahead and pull him down a bit in the mix.  Thanks for pointing that out!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot N0TAR,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=VEE0fBI3,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-08T21:58:56.625+0000)
>
> I didn't originally work on Eternum Nocturne, but after playing him I'd definitely agree that he is loud compared to base.  I'll go ahead and pull him down a bit in the mix.  Thanks for pointing that out!

Hey, thanks. It's my favorite skin, but that doesn't really mean I want his voice to be the last thing I ever hear. Now I can use him without fear! Just how Nocturne was meant to be used!

Heyo beany!

I laughed when first reading this, as my sounds are usually way too loud when I first get them in game.  Riot Eno will then have to convince me to lower them haha :)

I'll definitely look into raising the volume.  Thanks for the feedback!
Thanks for the feedback beany. I'll send this off to the audio designer (N0tar) who did his spells.

> [{quoted}](name=Utora,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=VEE0fBI3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-07T18:31:53.724+0000)
>
> Thanks for the feedback beany. I'll send this off to the audio designer (N0tar) who did his spells.

I don't personally have an issue with the sound. It's honestly one of my favorite skins in the entire game next to Pulsefire Ezreal which still holds the #1 spot for me. 

There is one odd thing though about Forsaken Jayce. The Q particle's lightning effect makes it a little bit more difficult to put the Acceleration Gate over it. It's so easy to do with the orb particle of his other skins, but something about the lightning particle just makes it harder. However it is something that you just have to adapt to. I got used to the timing and placement again, so I'd rather not sacrifice the awesome particle, but I did have minor issues with it with my first couple of times playing the skin.
